frontmatter.title: How to showcase a product for purchase in-stream
frontmatter.metaTitle: How to showcase a product for purchase in-stream
frontmatter.metaDesc: How to showcase a product that your customers can purchase right from your stream while you are live or in a replay.

pageProps.content:
Showcasing a product that participants can purchase right from your stream is easy with Reactive.

1. [Launch the Reactive Live Shopping app](/support/get-started-in-shopify/) in Shopify.
2. Select the *"Product Showcase"* interaction in the interaction panel.![Select Product Showcase](/blog-assets/support-assets/how-to-showcase-a-product/select-product-showcase.png)
3. Search for a product by name, or select from the pre-loaded list below.![Select a Product](/blog-assets/support-assets/how-to-showcase-a-product/select-product.png)
4. Pre-select any variants for the product you wish to pre-select, and leave any blank that you want the customer to select themselves(like size).![Pre-select variants](/blog-assets/support-assets/how-to-showcase-a-product/select-variants.png)
5. Click *"Start Showcase"*  to display the product for purchase right in the Reactive stream. You will see the showcase in the Reactive *Live Preview* as well as on your site if you have "*GO-LIVE*" switched on.![Start the showcase](/blog-assets/support-assets/how-to-showcase-a-product/start-showcase.png)
![View the showcase](/blog-assets/support-assets/how-to-showcase-a-product/view-showcase.png)
6. To end a showcase, simply click the *"End Showcase"* button above the *Live Preview*.![End the Showcase](/blog-assets/support-assets/how-to-showcase-a-product/end-showcase.png)

It is that easy.
